description: This simple recipe can be used to ice cupcakes and to sandwich cake layers together
keywords: Icing & frosting,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Rich Vanilla Buttercream Icing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the butter, 2 tbsp milk, and the vanilla in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth.
With the mixer on low speed, gradually add the confectioner's sugar, beating until the frosting is spreadable. If the frosting is too stiff, add the remaining milk.
